snippet: The governor offered many ambitious plans for New York, but he should start with real gun control, a minimum-wage increase and campaign finance reform.
abstract: Editorial applauds New York Gov Andrew Cuomo for his ambitious list of priorities for legislative session; urges Cuomo to begin with real gun control, minimum-wage increase and campaign finance reform.
lead_paragraph: The governor offered many ambitious plans for New York, but he should start with real gun control, a minimum-wage increase and campaign finance reform.
